name: Al4yc4t0r
body:
# al4yc4t0r (Alaycator)

A just-for-fun tool for converting a website to 'alay' (Indonesian-ish). 

## What's This?
A bookmarklet for transforming any website into 'alay'. Work best with Indonesian website.

## How?
Just drag-and-drop the following bookmarklet to your browser's address bar and see all the text transformed into alay. 

## What the heck is alay?
Use Google my friend, or just [click this link to Wikipedia](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alay)
tagline: A just-for-fun tool for converting a website to 'alay' (Indonesian-ish)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
